author: Chris Puetzfeld

review: The best way to make any television set into a smart TV.  Chromecast has pros and cons but for the price, there really is not better option to stream from a tablet, phone or a computer to a television.  Chromecast is also growing as a platform with the new Nintendo Wii-like control for games with your phone.  If you're looking for a streaming device and don't mind the absence of an on-screen menu, Chromecast is a great choice.
author: Sypno
